Detailed Description

Processor for analysing cellwise properties like mean signal, RMS, hit frequency, .

..

The processor creates histograms for each cell summarizing the hit information. In addition, the frequency of hits with respect to the total number of events is determined for each cell.

processor parameters

steering file parameter name

description

MappingProcessorName

Name of the MappingProcessor instance that provides the geometry of the detector.

Hist_ESum_xbins

Energy sum histogram: number of bins in x-axis

Hist_ESum_xmin

Energy sum histogram: lower limit on x-axis

Hist_ESum_xmax

Energy sum histogram: upper limit on x-axis

AHCALcollection

Name of the AHCAL Hit collection

OutputFile_txt

Name of the .txt output file

OutputFile_root

Name of the .root output file containing one histogram per cell
